content: the wasteland zipper is a fitted zip jacket with a top-down raglan construction and wide-cut long sleeves it features slanted inset pockets which are worked seamlessly // size options 1 - 2 - 3 to fit chest circumferences 80 - 90 - 100 // needles 2 5mm and 3mm the pattern uses a thicker yarn for the top-down raglan body and a thinner yarn for the collar and hems on the zipper and pockets // thicker yarn * 26 sts x 40 row = 10 x 10 cm in stockinette with 3mm needles * ~110m / 50g the jacket i knitted is pretty thick if you want the jacket to be lighter use a yarn that is a bit thinner but make sure the knitted fabric can still support the weight of the zipper especially if you want to use a metal zipper // thinner yarn * 34 sts x 55 row = 10 x 10 cm in stockinette with 2 5mm needles * ~210m / 50g
